Package com.csse3200.game.components.Companion

Class CompanionInventoryComponent

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.Component
com.csse3200.game.components.Companion.CompanionInventoryComponent
public class CompanionInventoryComponent extends Component
CompanionInventoryComponent handles all the inventory management for the companion.

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Entity item)
      Adds an item to the companion's inventory if there is space remaining.
      Parameters:
      item - An entity which can be put inside the companion's inventory.

    • getItemIndex

      public int getItemIndex(Entity item)
      Retrieves the index of an item in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to check if it is in the inventory or not.
      Returns:
      -1 if the item is not in the inventory, otherwise an integer >= 0 indicating the index of that item in the inventory.

    • getItem

      public Entity getItem(Integer index)
      Returns the item at a given index in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      index - The index selecting the item in the inventory.
      Returns:
      Null if there is no item, or an entity if there is an item at that index.
